fields.name: Tea Tree Oil
fields.description: “Tea Tree” or Melaleuca Essential Oil, is best known for its purifying qualities, which make it useful for cleansing the skin, home surfaces, and purifying the air.

fields.name: Lavender Oil
fields.description: Lavender essential oil is often considered a must-have oil due to its versatile uses. Its calming and relaxing aroma promotes a peaceful environment conducive to sleep and it can ease feelings of tension when used internally.

fields.name: Lemon Oil
fields.description: Lemon oil has cleansing, purifying, and invigorating properties for an uplifting, positive boost throughout the day. Shop our best-selling Lemon oil.

fields.name: Rosemary Oil
fields.description: While it is frequently used for cooking, Rosemary has long been revered by many cultures for its internal benefits and energizing scent.

fields.name: Citronella Oil
fields.description: Citronella is a tall grass grown in Asia with a crisp, fresh aroma. It is soothing to the skin and creates an uplifting atmosphere. Citronella essential oil is a known powerful insect repellent and an ideal companion during outdoor activities.

fields.name: Eucalyptus Oil
fields.image_url: Eucalyptus also has cleansing properties. Use aromatically or topically to promote feelings of clear breathing and open airways. Eucalyptus also adds to a soothing massage.

fields.name: Frankincense Oil
fields.description: Considered the The king of oils, Frankincense has extraordinary health benefits when used topically or taken internally.

fields.name: Lemongrass Oil
fields.description: A favorite oil for massages, Lemongrass oil provides a pungent, smoky aroma, and offers purifying and toning benefits for the skin.

fields.name: Patchouli Oil
fields.image_url: A member of the mint family, Patchouli oil is known to help with skin imperfections and for its grounding, earthy aroma.

fields.name: Peppermint Oil
fields.description: Peppermint oil also helps alleviate occasional stomach upset and promotes healthy respiratory function when taken internally.

fields.name: Elephant Oil Burner
fields.description: Rustic oil burner in an elephant shape

fields.name: Nighttime Oil Burner
fields.description: Quirky nightime Burner with the moon and the stars design, perfect for your nightime relaxation.

fields.name: Old Urn Oil Burner
fields.description: Stylish Antiquated Urn shaped Burner, which is eloguent in design

fields.name: Oriental Oil Burner
fields.description: Multicoloured Burner which is oriental in design, which will create a joyful ambience

fields.name: Teapot Oil Burner
fields.description: Ceramic Teapot oil burner, which is delicate but quirky in nature

fields.name: White Ceramic Oil Burner
fields.description: Simple but beautiful Oil Burner with a floral design
